description: I spend 45+ hours a week learning everything there is to know about web development. Our curriculum includes Git, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express, AngularJs, and NodeJs).

Managed client relationships for 14 automotive dealers. Stayed in constant communication with clients to plan and execute their social media strategy. Wrote creative copy to post on clients' social networks and use social media tools to interact with potential sales leads. Planned and carried out paid social media campaigns while managing client ad-spend budgets.
Managed social media and produced creative content for the company's social media accounts. Planned and created website copy to drive E-commerce traffic.
